questions.question: What have you been up to lately?
How are things going with you?
How's your day been so far?
questions.answer: I'm doing well, thank you!, It's been pretty busy but productive.

questions.question: Any exciting plans for the weekend?
questions.answer: I'm doing well, thank you!, Yes, I'm planning to go hiking with some friends.

questions.question: How's work going?
questions.answer: I'm doing well, thank you!, Work's been good, I've been making progress on my tasks.

questions.question: Have you been busy lately?
questions.answer: I'm doing well, thank you!, Yes, I've had a lot on my plate recently.
